title: Mission Control roster view + agent performance review
description: Brad Stevens: Update roster view in Mission Control dashboard. Review every agent's performance including Founder's. Suggest retraining needs.
resolution_note: Comprehensive agent performance review completed for all 14 agents + Founder. Report at reviews/agent_performance_review_021426_v1.md. Covers ticket stats (239 total, 206/207 active = 99.5% completion), individual assessments with 1-5 ratings, retraining recommendations (HIGH: LeBron James, Pep Guardiola; MEDIUM: Ime Udoka, Jayson Tatum), and Mission Control roster view gap analysis with 7 recommended dashboard additions. Schema inconsistency identified (4 tickets use status vs state). Unassigned ticket attribution analyzed (23 tickets).
